text:
^ yes disqus or other comment managers are just javascript plugins you would copy paste in `_layout/foot` , same with google analytics etc.
Side note: I strongly recommend *against* disqus, it's one of the least privacy preserving plugin out there.. there are alternatives like <https://utteranc.es> etc
